description: Non-directional pattern with its fundamental texture interest creates a pre-shrunk upholstery of great strength and versatility. Paper labeled Order W-2080, Duncan & Huggins, Granite custom color, Feb., To: LDC for custom color file, H. Taylor Custom Color (lt. blue, beige, white)
